# PdfPixels

> Free online image and PDF processing tools. Compress, resize, convert images and manage PDFs â€” no registration required.

## About

PdfPixels is a free web-based platform offering 38+ professional tools for image and PDF processing. All tools work directly in the browser with no signup, no watermarks, and no hidden fees. Files are automatically deleted within 1 hour of processing.

## Core Tools

### Image Tools
- **Compress Image**: Reduce image file size (JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC) while maintaining quality. Target specific sizes like 20KB, 50KB, 100KB.
- **Resize Image**: Change image dimensions in pixels, centimeters, or inches with DPI control.
- **PNG to JPG**: Convert PNG images to JPG format instantly.
- **JPG to PNG**: Convert JPG images to PNG format with transparency support.
- **WebP to JPG**: Convert WebP images to widely-compatible JPG format.
- **HEIC to JPG**: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG format.
- **Background Remover** (AI): Automatically detect and remove image backgrounds using AI.
- **Image Enhancement** (AI): Improve image quality, lighting, and colors with AI.
- **Crop Image**: Crop images to custom, square, or circle shapes.
- **Rotate Image**: Rotate images by any angle.
- **Add Watermark**: Add text or logo watermarks to images.
- **Passport Photo Maker**: Resize photos to official passport/visa dimensions.

### PDF Tools
- **Merge PDF**: Combine multiple PDF files into one document.
- **Split PDF**: Extract specific pages or split PDF into individual files.
- **Compress PDF**: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining readability.
- **Image to PDF**: Convert images to PDF documents.
- **PDF to Image**: Convert PDF pages to image files.

## Technical Details
- **URL**: https://www.pdfpixels.com
- **Pricing**: 100% Free
- **Registration**: Not required
- **File Security**: 256-bit SSL encryption, GDPR compliant, auto-delete within 1 hour
- **Supported Input Formats**: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, GIF, BMP, TIFF, PDF
- **Supported Output Formats**: JPG, PNG, WebP, PDF
- **API Documentation**: https://www.pdfpixels.com/api-docs
